faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Monochrome Conversion
faq.description: Learn more about our UltraThink algorithm and monochrome conversion process.

items.title: What makes UltraThink algorithm special?
items.description: UltraThink is our proprietary edge-aware conversion algorithm that analyzes surrounding pixels to preserve important details while creating clean black and white images. Unlike simple threshold methods, it maintains fine details and smooth gradients where needed.

items.title: What image formats are supported?
items.description: Our monochrome converter supports all major image formats including JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, and BMP. The output is always a high-quality PNG file with transparency preserved when applicable.

items.title: Is this tool completely free?
items.description: Yes, the monochrome image converter is completely free to use with no watermarks, file size limits, or registration required. Convert as many images as you need for your prophecy panels.

items.title: How does this help with Deltarune prophecy panels?
items.description: Prophecy panels require high-contrast black and white images as masks. Our converter creates perfect silhouettes that work seamlessly with the Deltarune Prophecy Panel Generator, ensuring your prophecies look authentic and professional.

items.title: Can I use the converted images commercially?
